titles.title: Release Our Reserve Now Act

To require the release of petroleum from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to address the burdens on the citizens of the United States of the anticipated high home heating costs of the winter of 2000-2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 9/21/2000--Introduced. Release Our Reserve Now Act - Requires the President immediately to: (1) implement a drawdown of petroleum from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to address the burdens posed by anticipated high home heating costs of winter 2000-2001; and (2) ensure that such petroleum products are not sold outside the United States.
